description: Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTV’s) to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTV’s) to departments and agencies of the Government of Canada and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users, on an as and when needed basis for up to five years when including all optional years.
duration_in_months: It takes up to 5 years, INCLUDING ALL OPTIONAL YEARS...
full_summary:
=====================================

**Request For Standing Offer for Utility Terrain Vehicles**

**Document Reference**
---------------------

* Document Reference Number: WS3707267907
* Document Title: Request for Standing Offer for Utility Terrain Vehicles
* Amendment Number: 10
* Publication Date: January 6, 2023
* Closing Date: February 10, 2023 at 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time

**Supply Description**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTV's) to departments and agencies of the Government of Canada and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users. The supply requirement is for delivery to various locations across Canada. The standing offer will be valid for up to five years, including optional years.

**Notice Type and Procurement Method**
----------------------------------------

* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The contract will be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Cantonment Requirements**
---------------------------

The UTV's must be:

* All terrain vehicles (tracked or wheeled)
* Capable of operating in a variety of terrain and environmental conditions
* Compliant with Canadian safety and regulatory standards

**Solicitation Contact Information**
-----------------------------------

* Name: Dustin Levere
* Email: dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: N/A

**Procurement Documents**
---------------------------

The procurement documents, including the solicitation package and bid form, can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15064512?extsite=MTUwNjQ1
